about.details:
Incorporated in 1993, Dev Labtech Venture Limited is a Premier Lab Grown Diamond & Jewellery Manufacturer. The company's registered office is situated in Bhavnagar, Gujarat and it also operates through its sales offices.

Dev Labtech has recently started the manufacturing of lab-grown diamonds, earlier to this, the entity was engaged in the processing of natural diamonds only. The company has developed expert skills over the years in mapping, designing, cutting, and polishing with innovation & extracting optimum output with less wastage while transforming rough to natural polish diamonds.

Dev Labtech Venture Limited has an in-house technical & Design team to make Laboratory grown diamonds. The company has placed the highest quality checks at every level of the manufacturing processes to ensure the superiority of its products.

The company is striving to expand its product line and offer complementary products to enhance its product portfolio.

faqs.question: What is the Dev Labtech Venture IPO?
faqs.answer:
Dev Labtech Venture IPO is a SME IPO of 2200000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹11.22 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹51 per share. The minimum order quantity is 2000.

The IPO opens on March 17, 2023, and closes on March 21, 2023.

Link Intime India Private Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on BSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Dev Labtech Venture IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Dev Labtech Venture IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Dev Labtech Venture IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Dev Labtech Venture IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Dev Labtech Venture IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Dev Labtech Venture IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Dev Labtech Venture IPO opens on March 17, 2023 and closes on March 21, 2023.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Dev Labtech Venture IPO?
faqs.answer: Dev Labtech Venture IPO lot size is 2000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,02,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Dev Labtech Venture IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Dev Labtech Venture IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Dev Labtech Venture IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Dev Labtech Venture IPO will be done on Friday, March 24, 2023, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Tuesday, March 28, 2023. Check the Dev Labtech Venture IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Dev Labtech Venture IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Dev Labtech Venture IPO listing date is on Wednesday, March 29, 2023.
